Body:
mu_0 = [0.0, 0.1, -0.1, 0.1, -0.1]
sigma_0 = [0.0, 0.1, -0.1, -0.1, 0.1]
h0 = 0.7
cosmoMG = ccl.Cosmology(Omega_c=0.112 / h0 ** 2, Omega_b=0.0226 / h0 ** 2,
    h=h0, A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, Neff=3.046, mu_0=mu_0[model], sigma_0=
    sigma_0[model], Omega_k=0, m_nu=0, T_CMB=2.7255, matter_power_spectrum=
    'linear', transfer_function='boltzmann_isitgr')
data = np.loadtxt('./benchmarks/data/model%d_pk_MG_matterpower.dat' % model)
a = 1
k = data[:, (0)] * cosmoMG['h']
pk = data[:, (1)] / cosmoMG['h'] ** 3
pk_ccl = ccl.linear_matter_power(cosmoMG, k, a)
err = np.abs(pk_ccl / pk - 1)
print(cosmoMG)
cut = data[:, (0)] > 0.0001
assert np.allclose(err[cut], 0, rtol=0, atol=POWER_MG_TOL)
pytest.mark.parametrize('model', list(range(5)))
